title: Justin Bieber plays basketball after wet trousers incident | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 607 shares Justin enjoyed some fresh ocean air as he enjoyed a game of basketball by the beach. His presence seemed to have taken some beach goers by surprise, who took to social media to share a photo and video of the singer playing a game of basketball. Life's good! The hit-maker looked in good spirits as he flashed a peace sign, basketball tucked away against his arm Peace out! Bieber looked relaxed as he took in some sunshine and fresh air 'Dude just showed up, with one security guard and called "next"...', read the caption of a photo of Justin jogging across the court. In a video posted by a fan, the chart-topper can be seen making his way across the pavement as he gave the game his undivided attention. It comes after Justin was spotted with an embarrassing wet patch on his trousers, just one day earlier. Sporty and stylish: Wearing a pair of black glasses, Justin rocked grey shorts, a sweatshirt, white T-shirt, and trainers Taking it in stride: But the singer shrugged off the incident as he posted a photo online of himself and and Adam Sandler's character Billy Madison But the singer shrugged off the incident as he posted a photo online of himself and and Adam Sandler's character Billy Madison. 'You ain't cool unless you pee your pants,' he captioned the snap. The quote was from a scene in the 1995 movie, in which Adam's character - an adult man force to return to school to prove he can run his father's business - pretends to pee his pants so that one of his school friends does not get made fun of for actually peeing his pants. Just dropping in: A photo posted online was of Justin making his way across the court during his refreshing basketball game What a sport! Bieber gave his undivided attention to the game Share or comment on this article 607
